name: A. Jzzhu and Children
statement:
There are children in Jzzhu’s school. Jzzhu is going to give some
candies to them. Let’s number all the children from to . The -th child
wants to get at least candies.Jzzhu asks children to line up. Initially,
the -th child stands at the -th place of the line. Then Jzzhu start
distribution of the candies. He follows the algorithm: Give candies to
the first child of the line. If this child still haven’t got enough
candies, then the child goes to the end of the line, else the child go
home. Repeat the first two steps while the line is not empty. Consider
all the children in the order they go home. Jzzhu wants to know, which
child will be the last in this order?
editorial: You can simply simulate it or find the last maximum ceil(ai?/?m).
